title: About
paragraphs: I am a research engineer in orbital mechanics and artificial intelligence. My work focuses on predicting satellite trajectories, detecting maneuvers, and developing machine learning methods for space situational awareness.

With experience at ÉTS Montréal and Look Up Space, I design deep learning models for time series forecasting, anomaly detection, and orbital maneuver optimization. My goal is to improve the safety and autonomy of space operations.
